ConnectionPool.name: Essb Connection Pool 1
ConnectionPool.Description:
Connection pool for Sample Essbase source. Instead of editing connectivity parameters in each connection pool, update the RPD and Session variables that hold that information (Manage > Variables)
Make sure you have - updated the default value of the session variable ESS_SERVER with the correct information, - and updated the password in the password field with the correct values
Note : you can also replace the "VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.ESSB_SERVER)" by the correct essbase server host name or IP adress directly
